timeline.bodyText: I think this would be potentially better with scheduleWithFixedDelay so that there's a guaranteed pause between runs. I'm concerned that a large data set would result in doDataExpiration taking longer than 1 second and putting pressure on the system by constantly running back-to-back.
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

timeline.bodyText: What do you think about removing this altogether? We do no testing with this mode and I wouldn't expect anyone to actually use it.
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

replies.bodyText:
I like that idea. It uses deprecated apis so I'd really want us to test with it before allowing customers to use it.
But I think that should be on its own PR. We have one about numThreads sys prop; seems like we could do it on that one.
replies.author: dschneider-pivotal

replies.bodyText: I added this to the numThreads sys prop story
replies.author: dschneider-pivotal

timeline.bodyText: Since you're working on this, could you move the log message after the start so that we log the actual port used in the event that it is started on an ephemeral port. (Otherwise it just says Starting... on port 0).
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal
timeline.diffHunk:

           String.format("Starting GeodeRedisServer on bind address %s on port %s",

replies.bodyText: We currently have two log messages. One says "starting" and shows the requested configuration. The other says "started" and show the actual host and port. It seems like both are worth having. Does that resolve this conversation?
replies.author: dschneider-pivotal

timeline.message:
removed main thread from GeodeRedisServer

removed NamedThreadFactory in favor of geode's LoggingThreadFactory.
Also now uses LoggingExecutors instead of Executors.
These classes makes sure that any unhandled exceptions that cause
a thread to die will be logged.

removed logLevel since it is configured by gemfire

A cache is now passed to the GeodeRedisServer constructor

region initialization now done in RegionProvider

extracted passive expiration code

extracted netty server code
also reduced dependencies on GeodeRedisServer

renamed close to stop

improved exception handling and cleanup up NetyRedisServer

changed passive expiration to use scheduleWithFixedDelay

fixed bind exception handling
